lines.text:
[about graduating]
This is the happiest day of my life, how did I ever graduate?

[whispering]
I slipped the guy twenty bucks. Now keep quiet.
If that's not Tommy Nelson it's Frankenstein. FRANKENSTEIN!

[Tommy Nelson is gone]
How did he get out?
Installments.
Installments?
Yeah, he did a Gypsy Rose Lee, come here!
[they find Tommy's clothes lying about]
That, that's all that's left of him.
Evidently Nelson changed clothes... what was he wearing when you last saw him?
Air... nothing but air... and then he asked me how he looked.
Wearing air? What are you talking about?

I went to shake his hand, his hand was gone, I looked up to speak to him, his head was gone. Then he took off his shirt, his body was gone, he took off his pants, his legs were gone! Then he spoke to me, I was gone.
I know, you saw this man disappear into thin air. Do you always see things?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: Only when my eyes are open.
Did you ever see somebody disappear before?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: Yes sir, I have.
This may explain it, seeing things. When did this happen?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: One day me and my brother were walking down the street... my brother disappeared.
Into thin air?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: No, into a man hole.
How about voices? Do you ever hear strange voices?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: Yes sir.
Aha, and when do you hear these strange voices?
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text: When I get the wrong number on the telephone.

[hypnotizing Lou with a watch]
Tick-tock-tick-tock-tick-tock...
lines.character: Dr. James C. Turner, Police Psychiatrist

lines.text:
[gasps]
You forgot to say the mouse went up the clock!
I told you not to get smart, didn't I?
[Taking his coat off]
Now, I'll show you who is the boss.

[Putting Bud's coat back on]
No, I'll show you who's boss.

[Looking around]
Who said that?
The voice is familiar; but, I can't quite place the face.
